title: Good Times
description: EllieWhen I was sixteen, I caught the eye of the most beautiful, most alluring man I knew. Dylan Mackay was an eighteen-year-old stud, about to graduate from high school. Our small mountain town’s golden boy, on his way to college on the other side of the country. He gave me my first kiss, then left without a goodbye.DylanWhen I first met Ellie Sow, she was too young. Then our paths crossed again. But that second time, it was she who left without a glance back. Now, I’m back for good and ready to claim what’s always been mine.Read along to find out how two fated hearts finally come together!A Man of the Month Club Novella
author: Imani Jay
